Articles.Content: Since I restarted my game, I'm only doing vertical takeoff vehicles. My goal is to build a plane like the title says. Has anyone does this? If not, I challenge people to build one that can transport 5 or more tons to space. When I get home, I will post mine.
Being an 'old guy', I don't know what the G.I. Joe Night Raven is. Can you give us some more details, like performance/capability and of course some pictures!

I would, but I'm mobile right now and I don't know how to post pictures. Here is the 80's commercial.

Edited September 17, 2015 by jmp470
